title: Author a Repair Specification
description: An aircraft has damage that is not covered by the Structural Repair Manual. A stress engineer must analyze the damage and write a custom repair specification.

tasks.description: Analyze the location and extent of the damage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent fully characterizes the structural damage.

tasks.description: Perform a stress analysis to design a repair (e.g., a doubler plate) that restores the original strength of the structure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent designs a repair that meets all safety and certification requirements.

tasks.description: Author a formal repair specification document with detailed instructions and drawings for the technicians to follow.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a clear, detailed, and compliant repair document.
